context.p: Kitchen supplies needed for this recipe:

steps.stepsection: Complete the following steps to make an omelette:

step.cmd: Melt 1 tbsp of butter in medium skillet over medium heat.
Drizzle 1 tbsp of olive oil in medium skillet over medium heat.
Place tomato, zucchini, onion, and green pepper in the skillet and cook for 4-5 minutes until vegetables are tender.
While vegetables are cooking, beat the eggs with the milk, 1/2 salt, and pepper in a large mixing bowl.
Remove the vegetables from the skillet and transfer into another bowl and sprinkle the remaining 1/4 of salt over them.
Melt the remaining tablespoon of butter in the skillet over medium heat. When the butter bubbles, pour the egg into the skillet and cook for 2 minutes.
Drizzle the remaining tablespoon of olive oil in the skillet over medium heat. When the oil bubbles, pour the egg into the skillet and cook for 2 minutes.
Gently lift the edges of the omelette with the spatula to let the uncooked part of the eggs flow toward the edges and cook. Continue for 2-3 more minutes until the omelette looks dry.
Slide the omelette out of the skillet onto a play. Cut in half and serve.
